version.description: The version of the federation list

domainList.description: The list of TI-Messenger domain names

telematikID.description: The telematikID of the organization that uses the TI-Messenger domain

isInsurance.description: Indicates if it is a domain of an health insurance for insured persons

ik.description: The IK (Institutionskennzeichen) numbers associated with this domain. Must contain at least one element when isInsurance is true. Must not contain any elements when isInsurence is false.

timAnbieter.description: The Zuweisungsgruppe im TI-ITSM-System of the TI-Messenger Provider, who added the domain
